```{r}
rm(list=ls())
library("readxl")
data<-read_excel("7.xlsx")
attach(data)
a<-sum(A**2+B**2+C**2)
sum(A)
sum(B)
sum(C)
a<-mean(A)
b<-mean(B)
c<-mean(C)
SS1<-var(A)*9
SS2<-var(B)*9
SS3<-var(C)*9
score <- c(A, B, C)
group <- factor(rep(c("A", "B", "C"), each=10))
data <- data.frame(score, group)
anova_result <- aov(score ~ group)
summary(anova_result)
x<-c(a,b,c)
sds <- c(sd(A), sd(B), sd(C))
ses<-sds/sqrt(10)
bar<-barplot(x,width=0.1,ylim=c(0,70),names.arg=c("A","B","C"),col=c("lightblue","lightgreen","pink"),main="不同教学方法下成绩对比",xlab="教学方法",ylab="数学成绩")
arrows(bar, x - ses,
       bar, x + ses,
       angle = 90,
       code = 3,
       length = 0.5,
       lwd = 2,
       col = "darkred")
```
